Name: The Rainbow Chrysanthemums
Description:
Product Description

What's at the end of the rainbow? Our bet is on this magnificently multi-hued bunch of beautifully bold blooms! Featuring five chrysanthemums that have been treated to a kalaidescope of zingy shades - aquamarines, candyfloss pinks and vivid lime greens unite for a distinctive new approach to garden-based gifting! Mermaids-in-waiting with a fondness for the spotlight will surely go wild for this dazzling display of floral finery.asion.  

 

STD
3 x rainbow chrysanthemum
1 x yellow chrysanthemum
1 x cerise chrysanthemum


LARGE
4 x rainbow chrysanthemum
2 x yellow chrysanthemum
1 x cerise chrysanthemum

Wrapped in cellophane

Stem length: Approx. 46cm  

 

Additional Information

Please note the card and vase shown is not included.

Our flowers may arrive unopened but the buds will come into bloom within a day or two.

In the rare event that a substitution is necessary through flower supply difficulties, we may substitute with flowers of similar or superior style, quality and value.

 

Warning: Not suitable for pets

 

Our Commitment to Quality

From blossom to bouquet, every step of your flowers’ journey is handled with care to ensure long-lasting, beautiful blooms. That means:

  • Five days of freshness guaranteed or we’ll replace your flowers
  • Each bouquet is hand-tied by our florists
  • Flowers arrive ‘in bud’ to preserve freshness
  • Guard petals protect flowers in transit
  • Bouquets come in our signature Nourishing Wrap to keep them happy while travelling
  • Next day delivery with full SMS tracking and a two hour delivery window
Title: The Rainbow Chrysanthemums
